sphere

Class ShopController

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.mvc.Results
      • play.mvc.Controller
        • sphere.ShopController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status

    public class ShopController
extends play.mvc.Controller
    Base controller for controllers using the Sphere backend. Provides a thread-safe instance of the SphereClient.
